src_original: atha candrottarādārikā samanantaraṃ pradhāvantaṃ taṃ mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyāṃ
tgt_original: 」爾時毘耶離大城之內，或有諸人一時走來，出聲大叫向月上女。

src_original: velāyāṃ vihāyasāntarīkṣe tālamātram abhyudgamya sthitvā ca taṃ mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ  gāthābhir adhyabhāṣata //
tgt_original: 是時彼女見其大眾速疾來故，遂即飛騰在於虛空高一多羅，仍執彼華在空而住，以偈白彼諸大眾言：

src_original: kāyaṃ mamekṣadhvam imaṃ manojñaṃ suvarṇavarṇaṃ jvalanaprakāśam /
tgt_original: 「汝等觀我此妙身，　　猶如真金帶火色；

src_original: na raktacittasya hi mānuṣasya prajñāyate śobhanakaṃ śarīram //
tgt_original: 非因昔發欲心故，　　能得如是微妙身。

src_original: ye etv agnikarṣūpamasaṃpradīptān tyajanti kāmān viṣayeṣv agṛddhāḥ /
tgt_original: 棄捨婬欲如火坑，　　及諸世事不染著；

src_original: ṣaḍindriyaiḥ saṃvarasaṃvṛtāś ca ye brahmacaryaṃ ca caranti śubham //
tgt_original: 能行苦行調六根，　　及行清淨諸梵行。

src_original: dṛṣṭvā ca dārān hi parasya ye vai kurvanti mātābhaginīti saṃjñāṃ /
tgt_original: 見他妻妾不貪欲，　　皆生姊妹及母想；

src_original: na rāgacittena mayārjito 'yam phalaṃ tu dānasya damasya cedam //
tgt_original: 此非欲心所熏得，　　皆由布施調伏果。

src_original: na me samutpadyati rāgacittaṃ mā vītarāgāsu janīṣva rāgaṃ /
tgt_original: 我今本無婬欲心，　　汝於無欲莫生欲；

src_original: sākṣī mamāyaṃ purato munīndraḥ satyaṃ yathā vedmi na jātu mithyā //
tgt_original: 今此尊像證明我，　　如我實語無有虛。

src_original: yūyaṃ ca pūrvaṃ pitaro mamāsa /  ahaṃ ca yuṣmākam abhūj janitrī /
tgt_original: 汝等昔或作我父，　　我或於汝昔為母；

src_original: bhrātā svasā cāpi pitā babhūva ko rāgacittaṃ janayej jananyāṃ //
tgt_original: 互作父母及兄弟，　　云何於此生欲心？

src_original: praghātitāḥ prāk ca mamātha sarve /  ahaṃ viśastā ca purā bhavadbhiḥ /
tgt_original: 我或往昔殺汝等，　　汝等或復殺我來；

src_original: sarve amitrā vadhakāḥ parasya /  kathaṃ tu vā jāyati rāgacittam //
tgt_original: 各作怨讎互相殺，　　云何於此生欲想？
非因有欲得端正，　　有欲定當生不善；
